other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis with Contrast
other_tests.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis; markedly enlarged right atrium; inflamed diverticulum of the sigmoid colon with surrounding soft tissue stranding and wall thickening; no evidence of abscess formation or extraluminal air; trace amount of free fluid in the pelvis; no abdominopelvic lymphadenopathy; moderate to severe atherosclerotic disease noted.
